items.title: Helicopter crashes into field near Doncaster
items.description: Emergency services were called to Ings Lane in Bentley at about 10:15 GMT, police say.

items.title: Health officials worried as flu season comes early
items.description: UK Health Security Agency urges people to get vaccinated with cases on the rise.

items.title: UK charters flights to get Britons out of Jamaica
items.description: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper says "many British nationals were there" during the hurrican's devastation.

items.title: McConnell to make Scotland debut against USA
items.description: Edinburgh back row Liam McConnell will make his Scotland debut against the United States in Saturday's opening Nations Series game at Murrayfield.

items.title: Afghan man in court after man dies in knife attack
items.description: Safi Dawood is charged with murder and two counts of attempted murder over the Uxbridge incident.
